messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

appoint as lead for opportunity march pm appointed lead opportunity va hi appoint lead opportunity regards march pm appointed lead opportunity va hi please appoint instead opportunity thank client march appointed lead opportunity va hi opportunity down against assuming instead thanks march appointed lead opportunity va hello appointed lead va order view opportunity add forecast please link opportunity id wish view opportunities which lead etc ca thank
